attributes.action: Remove Aspect of a Federal United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
To the mention of a British Federation is preposterous, by allowing each city, state, country to have maximum or free change of the laws of an economic stature will provoke economic decline.

Making these counties & countries with the ability to change their economic policy will be disastrous for the debt of Great Britain, as one has said that "95.5% of our tax goes to the HM Treasury which can be spent on our communities" this is a terrible comment as that money is required to pay for the debt that Great Britain has. By going by this policy the British Pound Sterling in a few years will be under the dollar.

Having this idiotic system will divide communities and promote independence from West minister.

There should only be one government with better representatives.
